option10.name: EESAVE
option10.desc: Preserve EEPROM memory through the Chip Erase cycle

case1.message: These fuse settings will disable the JTAG interface!

case2.message: These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

case3.message: Disabling external reset will make the ISP interface inaccessible!
